long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Maudify.io Audio Decrypter is a browser extension that decrypts audio streams in real time. Users should install this extension to be able to listen to streams which were specifically encrypted through https://www.maudify.io

Here's how it works:

1) A live streamer or video uploader encrypts their audio through the homepage of https://www.maudify.io. The encryption process generates an alphanumeric key which can be used to decode the audio.
2) A viewer/listener navigates in the browser to the place where the video is located. They should begin playing the video.
3) The user then opens the Audio Decrypter extension pop-up window from the Chrome tray. The decryption key is entered and the unencrypted audio should start immediately playing.

Overall, the encryption/decryption process enables streamers and listeners to enjoy an extra layer of security and privacy.

Go to https://www.maudify.io to learn more about the process!
